org.softsmithy.lib.swing.event

Class PopupListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • org.softsmithy.lib.swing.event.PopupListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener

    public class PopupListener
extends MouseAdapter
    A MouseListener that listens for popup events. Adapted from Bringing Up a Popup Menu
    Author:
    Florian Brunner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PopupListener(JPopupMenu popup)
      Creates a new listener for popup events.

      Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a component.
      void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when a mouse button has been released on a component.
      protected boolean shouldShowPopup(MouseEvent e)
      Returns always true by default.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PopupListener

        public PopupListener(JPopupMenu popup)
        Creates a new listener for popup events.
        Parameters:

      • shouldShowPopup

        protected boolean shouldShowPopup(MouseEvent e)
        Returns always true by default. May be overriden to provide more context sensitivity.
        Parameters:
        e - a MouseEvent object
        Returns:
        true if the popup menu should be showed; false otherwise
